name: 余琬琴
objective: 本課程旨在介紹微生物及其應用，學生將可習得何謂微生物，微生物如何運作，以及微生物的應用。課程內容包括: (1)微生物的分類、型態、結構及一般特性; (2)微生物的生長與控制; (3)微生物的生理與代謝; (4)微生物的應用，例如生物轉換、一次及二次代謝產物的生產、基因重組蛋白的生產、核酸藥物的生產等。
schedule:
1. A brief history of microbiology
2. Cell structure and function (I)
3. Cell structure and function (II)
4. Microscopy, staining and classification (I)
5. Microscopy, staining and classification (II)
6. Microbial metabolism (I)
7. Microbial metabolism (II)
8. Exam 1
9. Microbial nutrition and growth
10. Recombinant DNA technology
11. Controlling microbial growth in the environment
12. Characterizing and classifyling prokaryotes
13. Exam 2
14. Characterizing and classifyling eukaryotes
15. Characterizing and classifyling viruses, viroids, and prions
16. Applied microbiology (I)
17. Applied microbiology (II)
18. Exam 3
materials:
教科書
"Microbiology" by Rober W. Bauman, 3/E, Pearson (偉明圖書)
"微生物學 (精華版)" Rober W. Bauman 原著, 李振登編著 (2008)
參考書
"Industrial microbiology: An introduction” by  Waites et al. (2001)
"Microbial biotechnology: Fundamentals of applied microbiology" by Glazer, 2/e (2007)
